title: Laura Kuenssberg: end of year
description: Rishi Sunak's hoped for turnaround didn't happen. Despite several restarts, refreshes, reboots, promises of the 'real Rishi' coming out, the prime minister has not been able to shake his party out of the doldrums in the polls.

title: British warship shoots down suspected attack drone in Red Sea
description: A Royal Navy warship has shot down a suspected attack drone in the Red Sea, the Defence Secretary has said. Grant Shapps said it was believed merchant shipping in the Red Sea was the intended target, in the latest such incident in the key global shipping route.

title: Mark Drakeford is still barred from dozens of North Wales pubs after Covid rule row
description: Mark Drakeford is still barred from dozens of pubs in Conwy with the chairman of a pub watch scheme saying he will never be welcome. Mr Drakeford announced he would be stepping down as First Minister this week after five years at the helm of Welsh Government.

title: Coral islands in Australia at risk of disappearing
description: More than a dozen of the coral islands that mark Australia's maritime boundaries are at risk of disappearing, a study has found.
